alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 22 at 3:32AM HST until January 23 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND LANAI... .An extra large northwest (310-320 degree) swell will produce extremely dangerous giant size surf. Coastal water overwash may occur across many low lying roadways along northern and western facing shorelines, especially during periods of high tide. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM HST THIS MORNING UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves up to 12 feet. * WHERE...Lanai Leeward. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
